org.cloudgraph.store.lang

Interface StatementFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RDBStatementFactory

    public interface StatementFactory
    Common graph assembler functionality resulting from initial re-factoring and addition of parallel assembly across RDB and Cassandra services.
    Since:
    0.6.2
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
